law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 43, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1982 ch. 50, sec. 2, effective March 4, 1982. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 251, sec. 2.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Authorization for levy of either or both utility gross receipts tax and excise tax on income, in addition to occupational license taxes.
